SELECT W_SCHEDRIC.ID_SCHEDRIC AS ID_SCHEDRIC, W_SCHEDRIC.ID_RICERCA AS ID_RICERCA, W_RICERCHE.NOME AS NOME_RICERCA, W_SCHEDRIC.TIPO AS TIPO, TAB3.TAB3DESC AS DESCTIPO, W_SCHEDRIC.ATTIVO AS ATTIVO, W_SCHEDRIC.NOME AS NOME, W_SCHEDRIC.OWNER AS OWNER, (SELECT SYSUTE FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = W_SCHEDRIC.OWNER) AS NOME_OWNER, (SELECT SYSUTE FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = W_SCHEDRIC.ESECUTORE) AS NOME_ESECUTORE, W_SCHEDRIC.CODAPP FROM W_SCHEDRIC, W_RICERCHE, TAB3 WHERE W_RICERCHE.ID_RICERCA = W_SCHEDRIC.ID_RICERCA AND TAB3.TAB3COD = #tabTipo:VARCHAR# AND TAB3.TAB3TIP = W_SCHEDRIC.TIPO AND W_SCHEDRIC.CODAPP = #codiceApplicazione#
W_SCHEDRIC.TIPO = #tipo#
W_SCHEDRIC.ID_RICERCA = #idRicerca#
W_SCHEDRIC.ATTIVO = #attivo#
W_SCHEDRIC.NOME $operatoreNome$ #nome# $escapeNome$
$operatoreUpper$ (W_SCHEDRIC.NOME) $operatoreNome$ #nome# $escapeNome$
W_SCHEDRIC.OWNER = #owner#
W_SCHEDRIC.ESECUTORE = #esecutore#
AND W_SCHEDRIC.PROFILO_OWNER = #codiceProfilo# UNION SELECT W_SCHEDRIC.ID_SCHEDRIC AS ID_SCHEDRIC, W_SCHEDRIC.ID_RICERCA AS ID_RICERCA,
CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(50)) AS NOME_RICERCA,
NULL AS NOME_RICERCA,
W_SCHEDRIC.TIPO AS TIPO, TAB3.TAB3DESC AS DESCTIPO, W_SCHEDRIC.ATTIVO AS ATTIVO, W_SCHEDRIC.NOME AS NOME, W_SCHEDRIC.OWNER AS OWNER, (SELECT SYSUTE FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = W_SCHEDRIC.OWNER) AS NOME_OWNER, (SELECT SYSUTE FROM USRSYS WHERE USRSYS.SYSCON = W_SCHEDRIC.ESECUTORE) AS NOME_ESECUTORE, W_SCHEDRIC.CODAPP FROM W_SCHEDRIC, TAB3 WHERE TAB3.TAB3COD = #tabTipo:VARCHAR# AND TAB3.TAB3TIP = W_SCHEDRIC.TIPO AND W_SCHEDRIC.CODAPP = #codiceApplicazione#
W_SCHEDRIC.TIPO = #tipo#
W_SCHEDRIC.ID_RICERCA = #idRicerca#
AND W_SCHEDRIC.ID_RICERCA NOT IN (SELECT ID_RICERCA FROM W_RICERCHE WHERE W_RICERCHE.PROFILO_OWNER = #codiceProfilo#)
W_SCHEDRIC.ATTIVO = #attivo#
W_SCHEDRIC.NOME $operatoreNome$ #nome# $escapeNome$
$operatoreUpper$ (W_SCHEDRIC.NOME) $operatoreNome$ #nome# $escapeNome$
W_SCHEDRIC.OWNER = #owner#
W_SCHEDRIC.ESECUTORE = #esecutore#
AND W_SCHEDRIC.PROFILO_OWNER = #codiceProfilo#
ORDER BY NOME
